message:
Folk, important note: Don't go digging around in already established areas, *particularly* if you're breaking bits, blowing out walls, or digging unrailed pits. Not the least reason being that you're pissing in someone else's daisies. I don't like urine in my yellowish flowers, yet I've had to go patching up stuff on multiple occasions recently. 

This makes me unhappy. People don't want me to be *unhappy*.
